creator: 林一二
title: tiddlywiki/tiddloid-tweaks
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/tiddloid-tweaks
cpl.name: Tiddloid Tweaks
cpl.readme:
This plugin applies appearance tweaks to Tiddloid client. Currently it have these features:

* Hiding the toolbar when the file is fully loaded (Thanks to jdjdjdjdjdjd's [[idea|https://github.com/donmor/Tiddloid/issues/7]])
* Making the toolbar (as well as system status bar and navigation bar) match the page background
* An `Export data` link in [[ControlPanel|$:/ControlPanel]]
* An entrance to a JSON tiddler where custom action buttons on the toolbar can be configured
cpl.description: Applies appearance tweaks to Tiddloid client
cpl.author: donmor
